mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yaopin_name as yaopinName ,a.yaopin_uuid_number as yaopinUuidNumber ,a.yaopin_photo as yaopinPhoto ,a.yaopin_types as yaopinTypes ,a.yaopin_kucun_number as yaopinKucunNumber ,a.yaopin_old_money as yaopinOldMoney ,a.yaopin_new_money as yaopinNewMoney ,a.yaopin_cangku as yaopinCangku ,a.yaopin_clicknum as yaopinClicknum ,a.yaopin_content as yaopinContent ,a.yaopin_jinji_content as yaopinJinjiContent ,a.yaopin_gongxiao_content as yaopinGongxiaoContent ,a.yaopin_shuomingshu_content as yaopinShuomingshuContent ,a.shangxia_types as shangxiaTypes ,a.yaopin_delete as yaopinDelete ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
